author: NoveltyHat

text: I'm really looking forward to playing this whenever it goes on sale. From everything I've seen it seems great (and right up my alley! I absolutely love boss-only games like Shadow of the Collosus, Titan Souls and this), but the pricepoint is a bit much for me, especially considering it seems relatively short. If I had more money I'd be all over this one.

text: @Jeffrey Garcia Not currently owning any PlayStation console it's a bit hard and impractical for me to have PS+ :P That said, PS+ seems really awesome, I keep hearing how it keeps giving out really awesome games for free. Wasn't Rocket League free on there for a while also?

text: I like how on the first boss the music changes depending on the situation. I havent played it yet myself. I just watched someone play.
author: tija1012

text: I played this game briefly and really liked it: a stylistic boss gauntlet, duel style, with slick graphics and a pumping soundtrack as you can hear. The difficulty seemed quite good and I can see it being very rewarding. Great music like this helps to retry battles many times until you succeed.
author: SupraDarky

text: You might actually wanna try it on Promenade just so you can hear the ending credits... even on the easiest difficulty I couldn't beat the extra boss.
